issue.title: [CF 141] Add Support for Units marked as Maintanks
issue.body:
I currently use ShadowedUF as Unitframes and would like to add some TellMeWhen Icons to each frame.

In addition to common Units i use ShadowedUF to show Frames for BossUnits & BossTargets as well as MaintankUnits & MaintankTargets. As BossUnits are allready supportet, i'd love to see support for Maintank & MaintanksTargets to be added.


> Posted by CurseForge user Twister | Imported from CurseForge issue #141 | Raw

comments.body:
In version 4, you can already do this even though these units are not in the dropdown menu. just type in "maintank" or "maintanktarget" to the unit dialog.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Thank you for your comment. Really nice to know. I'm going to try this on the weekend.

Maybe justa stupid question right now: when in a 25man raid, we're running with 2 or more tanks - how to distinguish between different maintanks? Is it something like maintank1 .. maintank2 ... for the tanks and maintank1target ... maintank2target ... for their targets?

As you say the functionality is allready implemented, have i missed that blizzard added UnidID's for units marked as tanks or is it something that the TellMeWhen source has allready build functionality for? Just asking because if there are UnitIDs for these units allready, then i could use theses also in other addons i'm using which would be great!

Edited Mar 18, 2011

> Posted by CurseForge user Twister

EDIT: I lied. These are not units that can be used with TellMeWhen, or even standard Blizzard API such as UnitAura, but rather aliases used to set the groupFilter attribute on ShadowedUF unit frames.

Edited Mar 18, 2011

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Like i said - i tested it on the weekend, didn't see it working and then went here and saw your edit. :)

Having looked into ShadowedUF today and understood what you were saying about ShadowedUFs implemetation by setting a groupFilter. However, even if there are no direct UnitIDs assingned to maintanks there are events such as UNIT_AURA for their corresponding UnitID in the raid. (eg. like Raid4 or Raid 17)

Perhaps it's possible to listen to RAID_ROSTER_UPDATE for changes to main tank assignments and then setup an internal "translation list" MainTankX = RaidID by going through Raidmembers with GetPartyAssignment?


> Posted by CurseForge user Twister

Yeah, that is what I was thinking too the other day when I realized how valuable being able to track this could be.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Alright, this will be implemented in beta8, but I haven't had a chance to test it yet. I'll go in the PTR and make a raid group with a few people to test it if I remember to when I get home.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

I forgot to add them into the dropdown menu, but they are implemented nonetheless. Let me know how they work.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Haven't got time to test it currently, i'll think i gonna setup and try this by the upcomming Weekend. However - since you changed the ticket status to fixed, i think that you've done testing about it allready. Can't wait to get my hands on it! :)
